text: Love Island is a 2014 Croatian German Swiss Bosnian romantic comedy movie directed by Jasmila Žbanić and starring Ariane Labed, Ermin Bravo, Franco Nero, Leon Lučev, Branka Petrić. ==Other websites== * Category:2014 romantic comedy movies Category:Croatian movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Swiss romance movies Category:Swiss comedy movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:Movies directed by Jasmila Žbanić Category:Movies set in Croatia
title: Love Island (2014 movie)
